pages.about: About Us - Majestic Oasis Resort Main Casino Resort Services Contacts Discover Majestic Oasis Resort Experience luxury and tranquility at our world-class resort, where every detail is designed for your comfort and enjoyment. Our Rooms Choose from our selection of luxurious rooms and suites, each designed to provide a serene and comfortable retreat. Standard Room Deluxe Room Suite Villa Plan Your Stay Ready to experience the luxury and comfort of Majestic Oasis Resort? Get in touch with us to book your stay or learn more about our offerings. Our team is here to assist you with all your booking needs and answer any questions you may have about our resort. Reach out today to start planning your unforgettable getaway at Majestic Oasis Resort. Contact Us Our History Since our founding, Majestic Oasis Resort has been a beacon of luxury and relaxation. Here's our story. Established in 2016, Majestic Oasis Resort was built with the vision of creating an unparalleled destination for travelers seeking a blend of elegance and comfort. Over the years, we have expanded our facilities, continuously enhancing the guest experience while preserving the charm and beauty of our original design. Today, we are proud to offer a resort experience that combines modern amenities with timeless hospitality. In the early days, the resort started as a small boutique hotel, catering to a niche group of discerning travelers. Our commitment to providing exceptional service quickly gained us a loyal following, leading to several expansions. Each phase of growth was carefully planned to integrate modern luxuries while maintaining the unique character that defines Majestic Oasis Resort. We had established ourselves as a premier destination, known for our exquisite accommodations and exceptional dining experiences. The addition of new facilities such as the spa, multiple swimming pools, and event spaces helped us cater to a wider range of guests, including families, business travelers, and couples seeking a romantic getaway. Today, Majestic Oasis Resort stands as a testament to our dedication to excellence. Our team continuously strives to innovate and improve, ensuring that each guest's stay is unforgettable. As we look to the future, we remain committed to upholding the standards of luxury and service that have made us a beloved destination for travelers from around the world. Our Mission and Values At Majestic Oasis Resort, we are committed to providing exceptional service and fostering a community of respect and care. Our mission is to create a sanctuary where guests can escape the ordinary and experience the extraordinary. We value integrity, hospitality, and sustainability, striving to make a positive impact on our community and environment. Every aspect of our resort reflects our dedication to these principles, ensuring that your stay with us is not only enjoyable but also meaningful. Guest Testimonials Don't just take our word for it. See what our guests have to say about their stay at Majestic Oasis Resort. "Our stay at Majestic Oasis Resort was absolutely wonderful. The staff was attentive, the rooms were luxurious, and the amenities were top-notch. We can't wait to come back!" - Priya Singh "The resort is a paradise. Beautiful surroundings, excellent service, and the food was amazing. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a relaxing getaway." - Arjun Patel "From the moment we arrived, we felt pampered and well-cared for. The attention to detail and the friendly staff made our stay unforgettable." - Rani Mehra "Majestic Oasis Resort exceeded all our expectations. The facilities are fantastic, and the team goes above and beyond to ensure a perfect stay." - Sameer Desai Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Casino Resort Services Contacts This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. Got It!
pages.casino: Discover Our Casino - Majestic Oasis Resort Main Casino Resort Services Contacts Welcome to Our Casino Experience the thrill and excitement at Majestic Oasis Casino. Your ultimate gaming destination awaits! About Our Casino At Majestic Oasis Casino, we offer a world-class gaming experience in a luxurious setting. Whether you are a seasoned player or a newcomer, our casino has something for everyone. Our state-of-the-art casino floor features a wide variety of games, from classic table games to the latest slot machines. Our professional staff is here to ensure you have an unforgettable experience. Join us for an evening of excitement and chance, and see why Majestic Oasis Casino is the premier destination for gaming enthusiasts. pages.contacts: Contact Us - Majestic Oasis Resort Main Casino Resort Services Contacts Contact Us We're here to help you with any questions or needs. Reach out to us anytime. Contact Information Phone: +91 22243 39165 Email: majesticoasisresort@gmail.com Address: Jw Marriott, Juhu, Mumbai Get in Touch Name Email Message I agree to the Privacy Policy Submit Frequently Asked Questions What are the check-in and check-out times? Check-in is from 2:00 PM, and check-out is until 12:00 PM. Do you offer airport shuttle services? Yes, we provide airport shuttle services. Please contact us in advance to arrange it. Is Wi-Fi available at the resort? Yes, complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort. What dining options are available at the resort? We have a variety of dining options, including a gourmet restaurant, casual bistro, and a poolside bar. Are pets allowed at the resort? Unfortunately, pets are not allowed at Majestic Oasis Resort. Do you have fitness and wellness facilities? Yes, we have a state-of-the-art fitness center and a luxurious spa. What activities are available for guests? Guests can enjoy various activities, including live shows, outdoor adventures, and recreational facilities. How can I make a reservation? You can make a reservation by contacting us directly through phone, email, or our online booking system. Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Casino Resort Services Contacts This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. Got It!

pages.privacy-policy: Majestic Oasis Resort Privacy Policy: Your Data Matters Main Casino Resort Services Contacts Privacy Policy 1. Introduction Welcome to Majestic Oasis Resort. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information. 2. Information We Collect We collect information that you provide to us directly, such as when you make a reservation, sign up for our newsletter, or contact us via email at majesticoasisresort@gmail.com. This information may include your name, email address, phone number, and payment information. 3. How We Use Your Information We use your information to provide and improve our services, process your reservations, send you updates and promotional offers, and respond to your inquiries. We may also use your data for internal analytics to better understand our customers and enhance your experience at Majestic Oasis Resort. 4. Sharing Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties, except when required by law or when necessary to provide you with our services, such as processing payments through secure third-party services. 5. Data Security We implement a variety of security measures to ensure the safety of your personal information. All sensitive information you supply is encrypted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology. Access to your personal data is restricted to authorized personnel only. 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer’s hard drive through your web browser that enables the site’s or service provider’s systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. 7. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party sites. These sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Nonetheless, we seek to protect the integrity of our site and welcome any feedback about these sites. 8. Children’s Privacy Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we become aware that we have inadvertently received personal information from a visitor under the age of 18, we will delete the information from our records. 9. Data Retention We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected or as required by applicable laws or regulations. 10. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. To exercise these rights, please contact us at majesticoasisresort@gmail.com. We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe. 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the updated Privacy Policy will be effective as of the date of posting. 12. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at majesticoasisresort@gmail.com. We are committed to resolving any issues promptly and transparently. Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Casino Resort Services Contacts This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. Got It!
pages.services: Services and Amenities - Majestic Oasis Resort Main Casino Resort Services Contacts Our Services & Amenities Discover the luxurious services and world-class amenities that make Majestic Oasis Resort the perfect destination for your next getaway. Accommodations Experience unparalleled comfort and elegance in our beautifully appointed rooms and suites, designed to provide you with the ultimate relaxation during your stay. Standard Room Our Standard Rooms offer a cozy and comfortable retreat with all the essential amenities you need for a relaxing stay. Deluxe Suite Upgrade to our Deluxe Suite for additional space, luxury furnishings, and stunning views of the resort grounds. Presidential Suite Our Presidential Suite offers the ultimate in luxury and exclusivity, with a private balcony, living area, and premium amenities. Plan Your Stay Ready to experience the luxury and comfort of Majestic Oasis Resort? Get in touch with us to book your stay or learn more about our offerings. Our team is here to assist you with all your booking needs and answer any questions you may have about our resort. Reach out today to start planning your unforgettable getaway at Majestic Oasis Resort. Contact Us Spa and Wellness Indulge in rejuvenating treatments and wellness services designed to pamper and revitalize you during your stay. Dining Options Savor a diverse array of culinary delights at our on-site restaurants, offering everything from local delicacies to international cuisine. Gourmet Restaurant Enjoy an exquisite dining experience at our Gourmet Restaurant, featuring a menu crafted by renowned chefs. Casual Bistro For a more relaxed atmosphere, visit our Casual Bistro, offering a variety of delicious dishes in a cozy setting. Poolside Bar Unwind with a refreshing drink and light snacks at our Poolside Bar, perfect for a sunny day by the pool. Entertainment and Activities Explore a wide range of entertainment options and activities designed to keep you engaged and entertained throughout your stay. 🏆 Live Shows Enjoy captivating live performances from talented artists and entertainers. 🎞 Outdoor Adventures Embark on exciting outdoor adventures, including hiking, biking, and water sports. 🎸 Music & Dance Dance the night away to live music and DJ performances at our vibrant nightlife venues. 🏀 Recreational Facilities Make use of our state-of-the-art recreational facilities, including a fitness center, tennis courts, and swimming pools. pages.terms-conditions: Majestic Oasis Resort Terms and Conditions Main Casino Resort Services Contacts Terms and Conditions 1. Introduction Welcome to Majestic Oasis Resort. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms. 2. Reservations and Payments All reservations are subject to availability and confirmation. Payments must be made in full at the time of booking unless otherwise specified. We accept various payment methods for your convenience. 3. Cancellation Policy Cancellations must be made within the specified period to avoid cancellation fees. Please refer to your booking confirmation for the applicable cancellation policy. Refunds will be processed according to our policy. 4. Check-In and Check-Out Check-in time is 12:00, and check-out time is 10:00. Early check-in or late check-out requests may be accommodated based on availability and may incur additional charges. 5. Use of Facilities Guests are expected to use our facilities responsibly. Any damage caused to property or equipment will be charged to the guest responsible. We reserve the right to refuse service or access to facilities to any guest violating these terms. 6. Privacy Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these terms by reference, outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Please review our Privacy Policy for more details. 7. Liability Majestic Oasis Resort is not liable for any loss, damage, or injury arising from your use of our services or facilities. Guests are advised to take appropriate precautions and ensure their personal belongings are secure at all times. 8. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Majestic Oasis Resort and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content without our prior written permission. 9. Changes to Terms and Conditions We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of our website and services constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms. 10. Governing Law These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising from these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of India. 11. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at majesticoasisresort@gmail.com. We are here to assist you and ensure a pleasant experience at Majestic Oasis Resort. Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Casino Resort Services Contacts This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. Got It!
